name: The Last Light (Jacob Vaandrager)
description:
In a world, where monsters have taken all the light. A little boy finds the last remaining light source. His mission? To save the world.

Run as far as you can:

Press "SPACE" to jump, try and dodge the obstacles on your path,

Press "R" to fire a beam from your torch damaging enemies in its range,

Pick up batteries to charge your flashlight.
